input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive, Strategic Retail

Location: Illinois, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Build the future of data. Join the Snowflake team.

Our team is looking to hire for one of our most senior Retail territories. In this role, you will leverage your lengthy experience in sales to expand to new business units and teams within existing accounts, establish new executive relationships, and solve business and technical challenges for a named list of clients.

Your role will encompass prospecting, developing, and closing business within a timely manner while focusing on the clients’ requirements. The role also involves strategic account planning, executive mapping, creative problem solving, and being able to communicate complex ideas in simple terms.

This role is a unique opportunity to contribute in a meaningful way to high visibility, high impact clients. You will be successful in this role if you are able to act with autonomy, work with urgency, take accountability, and be open to new perspectives and ideas. Our team members are intellectually curious, innovatively solve challenges, quickly adapt to change, and are excited to exceed our customers' expectations.

AS AN ACCOUNT EXECUTIVE ON OUR RETAIL INDUSTRY TEAM AT SNOWFLAKE, YOU WILL: 

Be an expert on Snowflake’s platform, the Retail industry, and the broader partner ecosystemBe the trusted advisor to your clients by understanding their existing and future IT roadmap, making recommendations, and driving the successful utilization of Snowflake’s platform Prospect, conduct discovery calls, uncover client challenges, and identify new opportunities for Snowflake’s platformEstablish ongoing revenue streams for Snowflake’s platform and expand into new opportunities within your territoryAchieve sales quotas within your accounts on a quarterly and annual basis by developing account plans, territory strategies, executive engagement, partner relationships, and driving usage across the platformWork closely with Snowflake’s cross functional teams, including industry specialists, sales engineering, value engineering, professional services, marketing, legal and finance. 


ON DAY ONE, WE WILL EXPECT YOU TO HAVE:

10+ year’s sales experience selling to enterprise-level accounts Consistently exceeded multi-million dollar annual revenue targets within a list of named accountsDemonstrable experience sales experience within at least one of the following spaces: Data Warehousing, Business Intelligence, Data Science, AdTech/MarTech, Retail Media Networks, Data Clean Rooms, or AI/ML Experience within the Retail space selling to brands directly is strongly preferredExtensive experience negotiating, navigating multiple stakeholders, and closing business within large, enterprise organizationsExtensive experience with solution-based selling, experience managing long, complex sales cycles and navigating large client organizationsExperience building and maintain relationships across your clients, including C-level executivesExperience prospecting and engaging new business units to consistently generate pipeline and ensure healthy quarterly pipeline coverageProven ability to build and execute comprehensive account plans for your territory, develop a deep understanding for your client’s business, and achieve success for your clients and Snowflake Willingness to travel to clients, conduct onsite meetings, QBRs, and host client events on a regular basisExcellent presentation, communication, and listening skillsAbility to provide open, honest and respectful feedback contributing to an inclusive work environment The ideal candidate for this role lives in the Midwest or Eastern region


Every Snowflake employee is expected to follow the company’s confidentiality and security standards for handling sensitive data. Snowflake employees must abide by the company’s data security plan as an essential part of their duties. It is every employee's duty to keep customer information secure and confidential.

The following represents the expected range of compensation for this role:

This role is eligible to participate in Snowflake's commission plan and it is common for employees in this role to receive total on-target earnings of $346,500 - $385,000. The estimated base salary for this role is $173,250 - $192,500.Additionally, this role is eligible to participate in Snowflake’s equity plan.


The successful candidate’s starting salary will be determined based on permissible, non-discriminatory factors such as skills, experience, and geographic location. This role is also eligible for a competitive benefits package that includes: medical, dental, vision, life, and disability insurance; 401(k) retirement plan; flexible spending & health savings account; at least 12 paid holidays; paid time off; parental leave; employee assistance program; and other company benefits.

Snowflake is growing fast, and we’re scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth. We are looking for people who share our values, challenge ordinary thinking, and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and Snowflake.

How do you want to make your impact?

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Account Executive, Strategic Retail
output_json.summary: Join the Snowflake team as a senior retail territory executive.
job_responsibilities: Leverage sales experience to expand business units and teams within existing accounts
Solve business and technical challenges for clients
Uncover client challenges and identify new opportunities
Achieve sales quotas through account planning and strategy
Maintain relationships across clients, including C-level executives
Prospect and engage new business units
Build and execute comprehensive account plans
benefits: Medical, dental, vision, life, and disability insurance

Snowflake employees must abide by the company’s data security plan as an essential part of their duties. It is every employee's duty to keep customer information secure and confidential.
